name: Real Life Boxing
description:
📦 LET'S GET READY TO RECTANGLE! 📦

Real Life Boxing is a multiplayer fighting game inspired by a specific scene from a certain cartoon. RLB is an easy to pick up and play fighting game.

Three Classes of Fighters!

📦Out-Fighter - Juke your way to VICTORY! Become a real life Muhammad Boxi!
📦Slugger - Destroy your opponents with MASSIVE blows! Just like Larry Foldes!
📦Swarmer - Get up close and PERSONAL! Keep the pressure on like Joe Fragiler!

Controls
Red Corner:
📦WASD and Space

Blue Corner:
📦Arrow Keys and Right Shift

There are some future plans for development, possibly story modes.
